page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT IN METHWOLD
page.content: Employment in Methwold We interviewed all the owners of businesses in Methwold to find out how many people are employed in the village. There is a total of 274 people employed in the village, 136 men and 138 women.Some of these people work in shops, garages, schools or farms, but the majority are employed in food preparation, a tubular steel factory and a tree nursery. Many Methwold people travel to the nearby towns of Brandon and Thetford to work in the factories there, and a considerable number are employed in seasonal work at the Wissington Sugar Beet Factory.
